Total files in the data are 28 and we consider only following files  
[1] "activity_labels.txt"                         
[2] "features_info.txt"                           
[3] "features.txt"                                
[4] "README.txt" 
[14] "test/subject_test.txt"                       
[15] "test/X_test.txt"                             
[16] "test/y_test.txt"   
[26] "train/subject_train.txt"                     
[27] "train/X_train.txt"                           
[28] "train/y_train.txt"

variables explanation
1 Y  consist of data from “Y_train.txt” and “Y_test.txt”
2 Subject consist of data from “subject_train.txt” and subject_test.txt"
3 X Varibles consist of data from “X_train.txt” and “X_test.txt”
4 Names of Varibles Features come from “features.txt”
5 Xlabels come from “activity_labels.txt”

For further reference check explanatory marks in run_analysis file and Readme file
